name: Gulfam Ansari
summary: Senior Front End developer with 5+ years of experience designing and building responsive web design and mobile apps in the fin-tech and insurance industry. Proficient with CSS and JS Frameworks(ReactJs, NextJs, and Angular), with extensive knowledge of UX and user psychology.

work_experience.about_company: Acko is an insurance company that provides health insurance, auto insurance, and electronics insurance.
tasks: Worked on Acko's customer-facing web app where I enabled new users to enrol their self in the system
Developed an internal dashboard to create new policy plans, add-ons, covers, etc. Also, the dashboard is responsible for any kind of endorsement.

work_experience.about_company: Paytm is a fin-tech company that caters to all your cash needs in a digital world along with shopping, travel booking, etc.
tasks: Migrated the entire 24*7 support vertical codebase to ReactJs.
Developed and Maintained the support section for Android and iOS apps both as the code runs in Webviews.
Integrated the Freshworks chatbot in the Paytm App to handle user queries.

work_experience.about_company: Elucidata is a product-based company that builds software packages, provides customized solutions, and analyzes omics datasets to understand the molecular basis of cellular phenotypes.
tasks: Worked on an application called Polly for data scientists to visualize large omics datasets.
Created common private NPM packages for internal usage of the developers to save time.

work_experience.about_company: DroidTechKnow is a Blogging Website that provides tech-based articles to its readers.
tasks: Developed this website from the scratch in JavaScript, MySQL, and PHP in 2017. Now I am getting around 30k organic traffic per month.

education.collage: University School Of Information and Communication Technology

achievements.name: DroidTechKnow
achievements.description: Own a technical youtube channel named DroidTechKnow in which I upload tech-related videos for a youtube audience. I have 7K subscribers with around 3M total views.
